scripts.git-ignore: git update-index --assume-unchanged 'less/_variables.less'; git update-index --assume-unchanged 'less/theme.less'; git update-index --assume-unchanged 'flatsome-child/theme.php'; git update-index --assume-unchanged 'flatsome-child/components/component.vue';
scripts.git-unignore: git update-index --no-assume-unchanged 'less/_variables.less'; git update-index --no-assume-unchanged 'less/theme.less'; git update-index --no-assume-unchanged 'flatsome-child/theme.php'; git update-index --no-assume-unchanged 'flatsome-child/components/component.vue';
